message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to your positive consideration of this offer.
